title: 📊 Market Intel — Feb 17, 2026 10:00 AM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel Report — Tue Feb 17, 2026 10:00 AM ET

**Top Headlines: Gold crashes 3% as precious metals selloff accelerates | BTC slides to $68K on risk-off rotation | Nasdaq -1% as tech leads losses | Gemini stock plunges after C-suite exodus post-IPO | Strategy (SAYLOR) buys $168M more BTC at $76K avg**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Gold & Silver in freefall** — Gold -3% to $4,895, Silver -6.2% to $73 — massive precious metals selloff underway
- **Bitcoin under pressure at $68,000** — crypto slides alongside tech; BTC-Nasdaq correlation turning positive again
- **Gemini stock plunges** — COO, CFO, and Chief Legal Officer all depart months after IPO; Cameron Winklevoss takes over COO duties
- **Nasdaq leading losses** — down 1% as tech sector YTD return hits -5.85%
- **BHP-Wheaton $4.3B silver streaming deal** — major mining M&A in Peru

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

| Index | Price | Change |
|-------|-------|--------|
| S&P 500 | 6,795 | -0.60% |
| Nasdaq | 22,318 | -1.01% |
| Dow 30 | 49,416 | -0.17% |
| Russell 2000 | 2,640 | -0.24% |
| VIX | 21.20 | flat |

- **Tech sector** worst performer YTD at -5.85%
- **Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH)** jumping on activist investor stake & turnaround plans
- **Coinbase (COIN)** Q4 adjusted EPS 66c vs 86c estimate — miss
- **Warner Bros Discovery (WBD)** lifted in Q4 earnings
- **IREN** — B. Riley maintains Buy rating (bitcoin mining)
- **Riot Platforms (RIOT)** — Cantor Fitzgerald maintains Overweight

**Europe outperforming:** DAX +0.46%, FTSE +0.38%, Euro Stoxx 50 +0.38%
**Asia mixed:** Hang Seng +0.52%, Nikkei -0.42%, Shanghai -1.26%

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC: ~$68,000** — under pressure, derivatives metrics and ETF flows show lack of demand
- **Strategy (MSTR/SAYLOR) bought $168M BTC last week** — now holds 717,131 BTC at avg $76,027/coin (underwater at current prices)
- **Intesa Sanpaolo** (Italian banking giant) discloses $100M bitcoin ETF holdings + Strategy hedge (put options)
- **BitMine** adds $90M in ETH — Tom Lee says crypto sentiment reminiscent of 2018/2022 bottoms
- **BCH leads CoinDesk 20 index lower** (-2.2%), XRP down 1.5%
- **Gemini stock plunging** after simultaneous departure of COO, CFO, and Chief Legal Officer
- **DeFi: ZeroLend shuts down** after 3 years citing inactive chains and hacks
- **BofA survey:** Dollar bearish bets at decade-high — potentially bullish for BTC long-term
- **McGlone bearish call:** BTC could fall to $10K if US recession materializes
- **Bitcoin spam debate:** Improvement proposal to block spam drawing controversy
- **Hong Kong** approves first crypto company license since June

---

## 🔵 Bloomberg

- Bloomberg blocked (bot detection) — unable to scrape directly
- **Key themes from cross-referenced sources:** Risk-off rotation from tech/crypto into European equities, gold correction after extended rally, dollar weakness narrative building

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- No major breaking Tesla/SpaceX news this cycle
- **TSLA context:** Tech sector broadly down 5.85% YTD — Tesla likely participating in selloff
- Watch for: Elon/DOGE government efficiency news, any delivery updates

---

## 💻 AI & Tech

- **HN trending:** Bluetooth privacy exposé (476 pts), GrapheneOS privacy movement (517 pts), Freeflow open-source voice AI tool (225 pts)
- **AI job displacement** discussion trending on LessWrong/HN — "Why I'm Worried About Job Loss"
- **Quake 3 math mystery** making rounds (Scientific American) — fast inverse square root nostalgia
- **Tech sector** worst-performing S&P sector at -5.85% YTD

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

**NBA — Thu Feb 19 upcoming:**
- Rockets (33-20) @ Hornets — HOU -2.5, O/U 213.5 (KD 25.8 PPG vs LaMelo 19.3 PPG)
- Nets (15-38) @ Cavaliers (34-21) — CLE -14.5, O/U 228.5 (Donovan Mitchell 29.0 PPG)
- Hawks (26-30) @ 76ers (30-24)

**NFL:** Free agency buzz — ESPN's top 50 free agent fits, Super Bowl LX content
**Winter Olympics:** Milan-Cortina 2026 coverage building on ESPN

| Gold | $4,895 | **-3.0%** 🔴 |
| Silver | $73.13 | **-6.2%** 🔴 |
| Crude Oil (WTI) | $62.72 | -0.05% |
| Brent Crude | $67.81 | +0.09% |
| Copper | $5.65 | -2.59% |
| Natural Gas | $3.07 | -5.46% |

**Bonds:**
- 10-Year: 4.056% (flat)
- 30-Year: 4.688% (-0.21%)
- 2-Year: 3.48% (-0.17%)

**FX:**
- DXY: 97.34 (+0.44%) — dollar bouncing
- EUR/USD: 1.1827 (-0.19%)
- USD/JPY: 153.42 (flat)
- BofA survey shows record bearish dollar bets — contrarian signal?

**Key takeaway:** Massive precious metals selloff (gold -3%, silver -6%) alongside tech weakness. Risk-off mood but European equities bucking the trend. Dollar strengthening short-term despite long-term bearish consensus.
